contents:
1411 Secretary Brooke Rollins uncovers SNAP fraud:

“5,000 dead people getting SNAP. And 500,000 people getting SNAP twice under the same name." posted 13 hours ago by Looniz74 PRO 87 comments award share report block The Post Millennial @TPostMillennial • 13h Secretary Brooke Rollins uncovers SNAP fraud: “5,000 dead people getting SNAP. And 500,000 people getting SNAP twice under the same name."
87 comments Sort by Top Top New Worst Old Save Wupta PRO 79 points 13 hours ago At this point what’s the benefit of having any government programs?? permalink award report block reply Patriot4TN 33 points 13 hours ago If they have no goberment programs, how can they rob the American citizen? They need your money to funnel kickbacks into their coffers... permalink parent award report block reply guywholikesDjtof2024 14 points 12 hours ago ALL public service government programs have dead people on them. So do voting rolls. Prove me wrong permalink parent award report block reply Hanging_Chad 2 points 11 hours ago at least 2 voters will have died by the time all of the rolls have been checked tho permalink parent award report block reply MemoryHoleyeO 8 points 12 hours ago To perpetuate fraud and buy votes permalink parent award report block reply Zskills 7 points 12 hours ago Subsidizing the Walton Family permalink parent award report block reply negative_entropy 4 points 10 hours ago Rockefellers too permalink parent award report block reply SimaYi 1 points 9 hours ago Have to feed the third world and our resident feral blacks. permalink parent award report block reply load 2 more comments... deleted 50 points 13 hours ago IllIllIll 18 points 13 hours ago Yes I agree the Federal Government is too corrupt to fix. So far I haven't even noticed they're shut down. Of course, whether or not the government works, I'm still not getting any discount on my taxes. permalink parent award report block reply josiborg 25 points 13 hours ago The only way I believe this is if those numbers are from one county. Fraud is way bigger than this. permalink award report block reply IncredibleMrE1 31 points 13 hours ago We're talking about the 30 states that complied and turned over the data. The fact that they did so means they likely don't have as much fraud as the other 20 that refused and are having to be sued. But yeah, there's no chance the fraud is this small. permalink parent award report block reply Hanging_Chad 4 points 11 hours ago there's no chance the fraud is this small and definitely not exactly 5,000 / 500,000 permalink parent award report block reply OutlawPurpleHairDye 22 points 13 hours ago Double gibs? It's not just about the fraud she's talking about, double dipping and dead are from 20 years, what about the last 5 years. permalink award report block reply LearnAboutRoaches 6 points 11 hours ago Notice how she says.. how they all say "There are 5,000 dead people getting snap and" .. etc etc. Notice they never say: We found 5,000 cases of fraud that have now had their benefits removed.. It's always the same bs, hey did you know they are all getting this, right now Why the fuck isn't it shut off the second they "find it"? Because it's bullshit.
